thread.title: Emergency Crews Called Crash Between Vehicle, Horse & Buggy
thread.title_full: Emergency Crews Called Crash Between Vehicle, Horse & Buggy

author: hlang84
title: Emergency Crews Called Crash Between Vehicle, Horse & Buggy
text:
WILMINGTON TOWNSHIP (KDKA) — A vehicle collided with a horse and buggy in Lawrence County this afternoon.
The accident happened just after 4 p.m. at State Route 208 and Old Mercer Road in Wilmington Township.
According to emergency officials, the horse was killed in the accident.
Crews were searching the area for victims because no passengers were found in the buggy.
Stay with KDKA for the latest on this developing story.
